q1.question: How long does it take to implement Aitivate solutions?
q1.answer: Most implementations take 2-4 weeks depending on complexity. We handle the entire setup process, including integration with your existing systems, staff training, and ongoing support.

q2.question: Is my data secure with Aitivate?
q2.answer: Absolutely. We're fully compliant with Hong Kong's PDPO requirements. All data is encrypted, stored locally in Hong Kong data centers, and we never share your information with third parties.

q3.question: Do I need technical expertise to use Aitivate?
q3.answer: No technical knowledge required. Our solutions are designed for business users with intuitive interfaces. We provide comprehensive training and ongoing support for your team.

q4.question: Can Aitivate integrate with my existing software?
q4.answer: Yes, we integrate with most popular business tools including Xero, QuickBooks, HSBC Business Banking, Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, and many more. Custom integrations are also available.

q5.question: What's the pricing model?
q5.answer: We offer flexible pricing based on your business size and needs. Book a free consultation to get a customized quote. Most clients see ROI within the first 3 months.

items.question: Does it work with Xero, QuickBooks, MYOB, or my accounting software?
items.answer: The solution is agnostic to your accounting software. It works with invoices generated in Xero, QuickBooks, MYOB, and most popular accounting systems.

items.question: Which Hong Kong banks' FPS (HSBC, Hang Seng, Bank of China, Standard Chartered, etc.) does this work with?
items.answer: Our solution works with all Hong Kong banks that support FPS, including HSBC, Hang Seng, Bank of China, Standard Chartered, and all other participating banks.

items.answer: Yes, you can add your company logo, adjust colors to match your branding, and position the QR code anywhere on your invoice template.

items.answer: Each QR code contains a unique reference. When payment is received, our system automatically matches it to the correct invoice and updates your records.
